row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS
row.description: Check the job status and logging

row.Docu:
It calculates and publish the job status based on some known parameters. It considers the following things into account. * Any OS command failed or not. (E.g. ERRORLEVEL OS variable) * Job explicitly sets error code into known variable. * AE Script processing error. (E.g. Validation errors) It considers any non zero value as error scenario. Further based on job status, it logs the success or failure message into Job report.
This include can be only used in Job's Process tab. It can be used for both Windows and Unix environment.

row.process:
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" IF %ERRORLEVEL% EQU 0 ( :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ) ELSE ( IF %ERRORLEVEL% EQU 2 ( :SET &TEMP# = "******** CONNECTION TIMED OUT ********" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR = TEMP ) ELSE ( :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR )) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
:CASE "UNIX" execcode=$? if [ $execcode -eq 0 ] then : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO elif [ $execcode -eq 2 ] then : SET &TEMP# = "******** CONNECTION TIMED OUT ********" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR = TEMP else : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR fi if [ "$execcode" -ne "0" ] then exit $execcode fi :OTHER :ENDSWITCH
